formalpara.title: Interner Hilfetext zu dieser Applikation in Asterisk 1.4:

para.screen:
-= Info about application 'Milliwatt' =-
[Synopsis] Generate a Constant 1004Hz tone at 0dbm (mu-law)
[Description] Milliwatt([options]): Generate a Constant 1004Hz tone at 0dbm. Previous versions of this application generated the tone at 1000Hz. If for some reason you would prefer that behavior, supply the 'o' option to get the old behavior.

formalpara.title: Differenz des internen Hilfetexts von Asterisk 1.2 zu 1.4:

para.screen:
--- in Asterisk 1.2 +++ in Asterisk 1.4 @@ -1,7 +1,10 @@ -= Info about application 'Milliwatt' =-
[Synopsis] - Generate a Constant 1000Hz tone at 0dbm (mu-law) + Generate a Constant 1004Hz tone at 0dbm (mu-law)
[Description] - Milliwatt(): Generate a Constant 1000Hz tone at 0dbm (mu-law) + Milliwatt([options]): Generate a Constant 1004Hz tone at 0dbm. + Previous versions of this application generated the tone at 1000Hz. If for + some reason you would prefer that behavior, supply the 'o' option to get the + old behavior.
